meaningMnemonic: When someone wants to view the <radical>reality</radical> of your <radical>soul</radical>, show it with <kanji>humility</kanji>. Because the reality is... our souls are all a little dirty. And we haven't been the best versions we could be. So make sure when you show all of yourself you do so with some humility.
readingMnemonic: As <kanji>humility</kanji> washes over you, you feel a shaking in your <reading>shin</reading>s (しん). Humility lives in your shins, so now they're shaking and trying to bring you down to the ground.
